Text.val: // Author: Peter van der Veen; created 11.07.2001
13.01.2014 JH SCR18642 Changed m.BANK_MAINACCOUNT in m.ACCOUNTNUMBER
29.10.2012 GB SCR17645 Changed filename in call of UFB527 (currently uses BANK_HOFF_CODE which must be changed in ADMN_HOFF_COD)
05.06.2012 JH SCR17364 Changed filename in call of UFB527 and added error message
12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
08.01.2009 GB SCR14287 Changed access for the table HOFF from write to read
26.11.2007 GB SCR13164 Replaced HOFF_HADR_COUNTRY on COUNTRY_NAME
20.11.2007 AK SCR13050 added some extra merge tags for the word template
26.04.2006 SH SCR Added CHQU_CURRENCY for all cheque rows
//04-11-2005 JP SCR #9096 new Filelist function
24.06.2005 SH SCR8453 Uses BANK_CONTACT_DRAFTS_CHEQUES if <> ''
else BANK_CONTACTPERSON (contact person is not in use for all countries
according to the template, see f.i. for country DE)
17.03.2005 SH SCR7990 Changed part of filename of document from
"GNRL_CODE & OPH103" to "BANK_LANGUAGE & OPH103"
29.10.2003 JJ SCR4467 added ADMN_NAME to merge
16.09.2002 JJ SCR2186 added call to OXA500_3 (delete TWRG) after word merge
01.08.2002 JJ SCR1605 finished program using "word merge" concept
//JP SCR #9096 new Filelist function
